released handcrafted features.from sentence: We use the released handcrafted features , i.e. , the differential entropy ( DE ) in SEED and SEED - IV , and the Short - Time Fourier Transform ( STFT ) in MPED , as the input to feed our model .

sizes d N.from sentence: Thus the sizes d N of the input sample X t are 5 62 , 5 62 and 1 62 for these three datasets , respectively .

learning rate , momentum and weight deca.from sentence: The learning rate , momentum and weight decay rate are set as 0.003 , 0.9 and 0.95 respectively .

network.from sentence: The network is trained using SGD with batch size of 200 .

experiment.from sentence: Moreover , in the experiment , we respectively set the dimension d l of each electrode 's deep representation to 32 ; the parameters d g and K of the global high - level feature to 32 and 6 ; and the dimension do of the output feature to 16 without elaborate traversal .

implemented.from sentence: Specifically , we implemented BiHDM using Tensor Flow on one Nvidia 1080 Ti GPU .

adopt.from sentence: In addition , we adopt the subtraction as the pairwise operation of the BiHDM model in the experiment section , and discuss the other two types of operations in section III - D.
